scripts.build: npm run build:photo && npm run copy:photo && npm run build:music && npm run copy:music && npm run build:main
scripts.build:photo: npm --prefix sites/photo install && npm --prefix sites/photo run build
scripts.copy:photo: rm -rf sites/main/public/photography && mkdir -p sites/main/public/photography && cp -R sites/photo/_site/* sites/main/public/photography/
scripts.copy:music: rm -rf sites/main/public/music && mkdir -p sites/main/public/music && cp -R sites/music/public/* sites/main/public/music/
scripts.build:main: npm --prefix sites/main install && npm --prefix sites/main run build
